alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 19 at 8:19PM CDT until September 19 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ARCHER AND NORTHEASTERN BAYLOR COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Lake Diversion, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dundee, Mankins, Mabelle, Lake Kickapoo, Lake Diversion, and northeastern Lake Kemp. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
